column1: Dhenkanal is a town and a municipality in Dhenkanal district in the state of Odisha
Dhenkanal is at 20.67°N 85.6°E﻿ / 20.67; 85.6. It has an average elevation of 80 metres (262 feet).

column3: 414. Males constitute 53% of the population and females 47%. Dhenkanal has an average literacy rate of 79%
column4: higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 84% and female literacy is 74%. In Dhenkanal
column5: 10% of the population is under 6 years of age.
